Package app.model

Class SaveManager

java.lang.Object
app.model.SaveManager
public class SaveManager
extends java.lang.Object
Class allowing to manage the game saves
. operating:
  • creation of the SaveManager -> new SaveManager(absolutePath)
  • opening the current file -> openFile(nameSave)
  • writing to the file -> writeSave(saveFamiliar)
  • lecture du fichier/donnees -> loadSave()
  • data recovery -> loadFamiliar = this.getFamiliar()

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    SaveManager()
    Constructor initializes the directoryPath attribute

      Parameters:
      f - Familiar, familiar whose data is to be recorded

      java.io.IOException
